DOC.brief_title: Aripiprazole Treatment Schizophrenia With Co-Morbid Social Anxiety
DOC.detailed_description: Although research show social anxiety common among patient suffer schizophrenia schizoaffective disorder , rarely diagnose treat patient population . This study determine efficacy medication switch Aripiprazole treatment schizophrenia patient moderate high symptom social anxiety . Specifically study test possibility medication switch Aripiprazole reduce symptom social anxiety patient population . In addition , study test possibility Aripiprazole significantly improve social adjustment , quality life level function patient . The study may also assess ability Aripiprazole reduce sexual dysfunction .
